Withdraw staked ERC20 pool tokens. Will fail if user does not have enough tokens staked
@param amount the amount of tokens to be withdrawn. Unit is in WEI*

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) view external returns (struct IVaultsDataProvider.Vault memory)

documentation.text:
Releases outstanding rewards balances to the user
@param _user the address of the user for which the reward tokens will be released

Restakes the outstanding PAR reward balance to the user. Instead of sending the PAR to the user, it will be added to their stake
@param _user the address of the user for which the PAR tokens will be restaked
Reapplies the boost of the user, useful a whale's vMIMO has decreased but their boost is still the original value

Releases outstanding rewards balances to the user
@param _user the address of the user for which the reward tokens will be released

Updates the internal state variables based on user's veMIMO hodlings
@param _user the address of the user
Updates the internal state variables after accounting for newly received MIMO tokens

Returns the number of tokens a user can claim via `releaseMIMO`
@return number of MIMO tokens that the user can claim

Returns the number of PAR tokens the user has earned as a reward
@return number of PAR tokens that will be sent automatically when staking/unstaking

deposit(uint256).details: this function uses `transferFrom()` and requires pre-approval via `approve()` on the ERC20

params.amount: the amount of tokens to be deposited. Unit is in WEI*
the amount of debt+liquidationFee to repay
params.dexIndex: the index of dex in dex address provider mapping
params.dexTxData: the tx data used to sell collateral back to PAR*
params.vaultId: the ID of the vault to be liquidated

returns._0: number of MIMO tokens that the user can claim
nnumber of PAR tokens that will be sent automatically when staking/unstaking

params._user: the address of the user for which the reward tokens will be released
the address of the user for which the PAR tokens will be restaked

setBoostConfig((uint256,uint256,uint256,.details: can only be called by protocol manager

params.newBoostConfig: contains all boost multiplier parameters, see {IGenericMinerV2 - BoostConfig}

setLiquidateCallerReward(uint256).details: can only be called by protocol manager

params.amount: the amount to reward liquidate method callers with

returns._0: number of staked tokens with boost
`struct UserInfo { uint256 stake; uint256 stakeWithBoost; uint256 accAmountPerShare; uint256 accParAmountPerShare; }`*

params.amount: the amount of tokens to be withdrawn. Unit is in WEI*

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit an ERC20 pool token for staking

liquidate(uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes).notice: Liquidate a vault with a specific amount, and sell collaterall back to PAR

pendingMIMO(address).notice: Returns the number of tokens a user can claim via `releaseMIMO`

pendingPAR(address).notice: Returns the number of PAR tokens the user has earned as a reward

releaseRewards(address).notice: Releases outstanding rewards balances to the user

restakePAR(address).notice: Restakes the outstanding PAR reward balance to the user. Instead of sending the PAR to the user, it will be added to their stake

stake(address).notice: Returns the number of tokens a user has staked

stakeWithBoost(address).notice: Returns the number of tokens a user has staked with the boost

updateBoost(address).notice: Reapplies the boost of the user, useful a whale's vMIMO has decreased but their boost is still the original value

userInfo(address).notice: Returns the userInfo stored of a user

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw staked ERC20 pool tokens. Will fail if user does not have enough tokens staked
